meanings: take the first step toward(s) success
take the first step toward success

vlive.korean: 이게 너네들을 향한 내 마음이야! It's my heart for you! 듣기 View video iKON : 12월31일!!!!!!!!

vlive.english: Okay, shoot your heart toward ATINY.
